CustomField.formula: IF( OR( OffSpec_Discount_Director__c > 0, OffSpec_Discount_Manager__c > 0, OffSpec_Discount_Senior_Director__c > 0, OffSpec_Discount_VP__c > 0, OnSpec_Discount_Director__c > 0, OnSpec_Discount_Senior_Director__c > 0, OnSpec_Discount_VP__c > 0, Requires_approval_for_amount__c = true), "This quote requires approval", "This quote does NOT require approval")
CustomField.label: Requires approval
